compatibility.notes: The RSA-MD license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing additional restrictions.

key_requirements: Include copyright notice in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
Include a notice stating the software is provided 'as is' without warranty.
license.name: RSA-MD
obligations: Identify the software as 'RSA Data Security, Inc. MD5 Message-Digest Algorithm' in all material mentioning or referencing the software.
Identify derivative works as 'derived from the RSA Data Security, Inc. MD5 Message-Digest Algorithm' in all material mentioning or referencing the derived work.
Retain notices in any copies of any part of the documentation and/or software.
